title: Did Ivanka Trump say, " Let's ask what we can do for Dad '?
subtitle: The daughter of the President of the United States has been harshly criticized in India for tweeting support for a poor girl who turned her wounded father 750 miles.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Ivanka Trump said, "Let's not ask what my father can do for us, let's ask what we can do for my father."
